website_summaries.verdict: Beautify and shield your entire garage floor with this absorbent, waterproof-backed charcoal mat.
pros: The edgeless design looks great in any garage and will easily absorb water, melting snow, and any leaks from your car
The waterproof backing provides extra protection against heavy spills, and installation is as simple as rolling it out and adhering on the edges
Material can be trimmed to fit and edges won’t fray
Can be cleaned with a vacuum or hosed off and hung to dry
cons: Users have reported mat is folded during shipping, and creases can be difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I unrolled this mat butted it agains the garage door threshold and took a micro cloth floor sweeper and used it to smooth the wrinkles out. It laid flat and hasn't budged with the car coming in and out of the garage. I did not need any carpet tape to hold the corners down. It is lightweight and thin however don't let that fool you. It does what it says it will. Keeps the garage clean and dry. Very easy to clean, just vacuum if dirty, rain water drip from the car evaporates quickly so I've never had to squeegee the water out. I'm very happy with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Weedpuller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are very expensive for glorified felt with a thin rubber back. If you put them on a floor you will constantly be fixing them. The wind blows them as well as walking on them makes them move. They say to use double sided tape which is ridiculous for the price of these. The tape doesn't hold for long. We are only keeping these to put them in the crawl space at our cabin otherwise I would have sent them back right away. Extremely cheap priduct
customer_reviews.author: Cactuslily56

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my garage upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This garage mat was the perfect final touch for the major overhaul of my garage. I learned, however, that you don't need to buy the double-sided tape to hold it down. It stays nicely put where it's laid and doesn't present a tripping hazard. And by not taping it down, I can always pull it out onto the driveway to clean it. This is a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: JTM

customer_reviews.title: Take the time necessary to install correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Once the carpet is taped down to the floor it sticks. So take your time, read the instructions carefully, measure carefully and install carefully taking the necessary time to do the job right. It absorbs water thoroughly, cleans easily and gives the garage floor a cleaner appearance. We bought it because we have snow that drops off the underside of the car and melts onto the garage floor. This carpet absorbs that melted water which, in turn, keeps the water from running underneath cabinets and other items stored in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for the floor
customer_reviews.text: I painted my garage floor with an epoxy paint specifically made for garage floors. I let it cure for 30 days using cardboard under my cars wheels per the instructions. Still, hot tires took up the paint especially when the wheel is turned and the car is stationary. I repaired the spot, let them cure, and put down the carpeting for each spot in my two car garage. While it is hard to get all the wrinkles out - I was not able to - it lays reasonably flat. The backing on the carpet stays put with minimal use of the tape included to secure it to the garage floor. Vacuums better than it sweeps using a standard shop vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Better off with no mat...
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out all the great reviews. This mat is basically a fabric top that acts like velcro for almost all debris... leaves, twigs, etc. That being said, it's almost impossible to clean. With no mat, I could quickly sweep the floor debris out the door. Now it's just a big ugly mat covered with the debris mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is terrible. Folded in half be rolled. Results in deep wrinkles. Impossible to install with tape as to reduce wrinkles and creases the tape will not hold it in place. Have 2 installed in my garage and there are bumps on edges and creases in other places. Can only hope it relaxes and the mess smoothS out. Too late as I had to cut to fit. Don’t buy it. I anticipate I will get frustrated by its appearance and throw it away. Wasted $250 on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this long enough to accurately comment on it’s absorbency or how easy it is to clean; however, am disappointed that it is so thin. Also, although it mentions the ability to tale the corners down to prevent shifting, when I used two sided tape to do this, I now realize attempting to lift the corners to readjust the mat results in the backing sticking to the tape and ripping off the mat....very flimsy for the price. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy62

customer_reviews.title: Mats Shed Horribly
customer_reviews.text: I have used car parking mats for many years and I thought I would try this from this vendor and regret that I bought two of them.. They shed every time I walk on them and the plastic coating was peeling off the backside when I was unrolling the mats. I had no idea that these mats were so thin and made so cheap. I have yet to park my car on them as I fear that they will shed and tear if I drive on them. I have no choice but to return them and at the pricey cost I thought they were more well made. I just received them a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped up in wheel well of vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product. Very thin! Tire can easily pick it up and wrap it around the wheel. Once that happens it never lays flat again. So thin and flimsy it is very difficult to vacume and a hassle to wash. Better to go to Home Depot or Lowe’s and purchase a heavier indoor outdoor carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bravocommand

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this little package would arrive and instead a nice size mat came. It was light and exactly what I needed. I laid it out on the floor, marked it, taped it down with the provided double stick tape, and cut it with some scissors to the proper size. Man it looks great on our epoxy painted floor. Makes the garage look upscale and it does protect the floor from tire burn. It cleans pretty easy and I can even use a squeegee to smooth out air pockets or standing water.
customer_reviews.author: RUDY

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two 22' x 8'10" mats - wishing I could return but outside of the return window. Once the product gets any amount of water on/under the mat it will no longer stay in place and actually becomes slippery if the mat bunches up when the car tires turn on the mat. Didn't find out this wonderful "option" until we had lots of rain and the mat became soaked from the in and out from the two cars. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Chapel

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Get Flat
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, doesn’t lay flat even with tape. They need to extend the rubber bottom beyond the carpet top . I think would allow it to lay flat. Plus I live in Vegas where it’s hot find another way to package, carpet was stuck to rubber bottom. A nightmare to separate. Caused some damage but not with with the effort to return. Was going to buy my son one but I’ll wait and see how this holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for garage floor
customer_reviews.text: We painted our garage floor and had some problems with “hot tire lift.” (This is in FL). I got this mat to stop this process and found it was great for other reasons too. Things don’t roll as much if you drop items on the floor, and it looks great. I do keep a piece of cardboard under the engine to catch the AC drips, and change that out frequently. I do think it is better to have under car tires on vehicle that is stored in garage in hot temperatures too.
customer_reviews.author: DAP

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for garage car mat.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. It would be nice if it were slightly heavier. You need to buy the double stick carpet tape to anchor the corners and near the center of each side. It's nice that it can be vacuumed with a shop vac to help keep it clean. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: LarLyn

customer_reviews.title: Hides and Ugly Garage Floor Quite Well
customer_reviews.text: We put a hot tub in the garage. I wanted a little bit of extra insulation for the hot tub (Intex portable) and also did not want my bare feet touch the garage floor due to cold and oil. Even after we cleaned and mopped the floor it was dirty. These mats helped a lot. Makes the garage look like a room to the house. We bought two through the warehouse. Comes in a big box, but is easily maneuverable. Easy to install. So far, one on the ground, it does not move, but we did tape the ends and taped the two mats together. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Short and Crooked
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 2 stars upon initial review. I would expect this mat to be measured correctly. As you can see in the photos one of the mats is cut crooked and the other is short by nearly 4 in. Measure twice, cut once? Winter will be upon us in a few months and time will tell how well the mats hold up...fingers crossed they live through the heavy snow and wicked salt that is tracked in on our autos.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good luck if you need customer service. Not very coherent
customer_reviews.text: Bad color matches from roll to roll and you will have to cut the seams in they are not straight. pray you don’t have to talk to customer service .Don’t know how it will hold up will find out though. If you vacuum it you will whined carpet fabric on vacuum roller every time you vacuum it. It does keep the cold down from a garage floor cement. Salt will stain mat.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Makes the garage floor look so much better
customer_reviews.text: After only three years, the garage floor was all scratched and ugly. I didn't want to spend a ton of money having it resealed so I asked a friend for a suggestion. He said get a floor mat and I'll set it down for you. So I did! Not only does it look great but it gives me a marker to see where to park when entering the garage. I'm so glad I got this. I won't have to worry in the winter when i drag in snow and salt.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even take it out of the box and returned it
customer_reviews.text: The Armor-all name was the reason I chose this product over others. I thought it would be better. I was expecting something durable that a car could drive on repeatedly and be cleaned with a power washer. I opened the top of the box and saw it was nothing more than thick felt. There was no way that was going to stand up to being scrubbed without falling apart. For the price I didn't want to take a chance that I couldn't return it after trying it. I didn't even take it out of the box. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: My garage is almost a second living room
customer_reviews.text: This is nearly perfect. I say nearly because the only thing better would be the option for custom sizes. It looks and feels great plus it washes well. Additionally, the box it comes in ( I suppose it depends on size purchases) is perfect for cats once you open both ends. There’s even a window with strategically placed text. For having my garage 80% covered and including some amusing cat “furniture”, this is easily a minimum of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Sitapara

customer_reviews.title: Almost wall to wall protection !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the garage floor mat to protect my newly painted garage floors. The floor mat is a high quality material and easy to clean and provides a protectant to the painted floor with a soft surface and a protective sealed base to keep grease and fluids from staining the floor. It was easy to put down and fasten to floor with adhesive tape and looks awesome when done. Even makes it more comfortable to work in the garage when you need a place to work on a project. I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: PJV

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat for New Garage Floor
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 18X8 version to cover the entire third car side of my newly epoxy laid floor. This size is holding a tractor, lawnmower, 2 snowblowers, three bikes, a large trailer for the tractor, wheelbarrow and all my lawn tools. Mat is easy to lay out. And yes, it will smooth out over time. I had the 6X8 version and just got rid of it after several years use. Nice protective layer on the new floor. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Koch

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Taped it to the garage floor with double-sided velcro. Easy to get out of the box and unroll, but you need to let the creases fall out. It was longer and skinnier than I thought (basically goes under a car with xtra top and bottom but not in width. I could use 2 of them, but seeing how this works for now. You can cut it and use the xtra for somewhere else, which is what I did. We don't have much weather here and don't know how it would work with lots of water and mud.
customer_reviews.author: sandiegonana

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if any oil has seeped through. Seems to be holding up well. Can't see the oil spots on it without holding a flashlight to it. I used 3 inch carpet tape to secure it. When I tried to peel it up to look underneath the tape stuck so we'll it ripped part of the backing. Probably have to use a dissolving agent to remove the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Robert hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait-get this!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh.my.goodness!! This was the best $$ we ever spent. Our F150 Pick-up fits easily on the mat, and it catches all the snow melt (frequent in WIsconsin) and keeps it off the floor. Use a squeegee to remove water when it gets to be soggy. Keeps water from running all over the garage. Absolutely love it. We did not use the sticky tape to adhere to the floor; it stays in place just fine, and will allow for easy “hose down” cleaning outside in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda White

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great floor mat. Easy to put down ,I had to trim off a bit because of our work bench I used the trim to add a walking path from the drivers door. I didn’t get around to taping it before winter weather but it stays put fine. It super easy to sweep off leaves of grass. Now that it’s had snow melt on it I love it more the snow soaks in so the floor doesn’t get slippery. It drys as soon as it warms up a bit. I’m so glad I chose this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Penny J.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The mat has worked better than expected. I was worried about the need to tape it down, however there has been no need to do so. It protects the floor well from tire marks, but after seeing how thick it is (almost like a thick felt with a rubber backing) I would never imagine that it would absorb large amount of melting snow from beneath the underside of the car. It will soak up water from a rain soaked vehicle and keep it off the floor. It vacuums easily, however leaves tend to stick into it when blowing it clean with a leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Saves our garage concrete floor
customer_reviews.text: This mat completely covered the area under our mid sized SUV. It was easy to install but the double back tape that came with the mat didn't always stick to the floor and I had to add more tape to keep it down. The instructions for cleaning say to vacuum the mat which I have not done. I think my vacuum will lift it off the floor. Some leaves and small tewigs have stuck on the material and are hard to sweep away. All in all I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to install. Wrinkles only come out if you stretch and secure it (tape provided) to the floor. Like other reviewers have stated, it does grab every little debris. It vacuums fairly well but literally holds on to most small debris, leaving you to hand pick it out of the fibers and making the problem worse. My truck leaves tire impressions in the the thin material. I live in Arizona so it will be interesting to see if scalding tires destroys it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects my fancy garage floor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to protect the newly painted garage floor. It seems to do that. The material is pretty thin and doesn't really feel very strong, but I think it actually is pretty rugged. We've abused it pretty hard and so far, no rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: denny48

customer_reviews.title: Great Garage Floor Mat For Car
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with Armour All Garage Floor Mat I recently purchased thru Amazon. I was tired of having to deal with pitted floor from snow and rain and decided to put this down i the garage side where I park my car. It was recommended to me by friends who also purchased this product awhile ago. I am anxious to see how it fairs when the winter is upon us.. So far, it has absorbed the car when wet. It was very easy to install. I would not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Floor Fix!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had my garage enclosed. I didn’t want to repaint the floor or spend the money to have a flooring put down. Though these were a bit pricey, they took care of my floor issues!! They vacuum really well and look great. I do wish they were just a bit thicker. I would have given them 5 stars, but one of the floor mat is 2” shorter than the other. They were suppose to be 17’. Quality control issue!
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Nice for garage floor
customer_reviews.text: I got it to protect my garage floor from the yuk my car drags in. It was easy to install (after I cleaned the floor really well) and it cuts easily with a pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: jadedangel

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this on our garage floor for a few weeks. It is shedding a lot and doesn't look nice. It is hard to vacuum up debris because the debris attaches to the shedding. We ordered 2 for a double-car garage and they weren't the same size. Not super happy with our purchase. When these totally wear out we'll find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S G

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery that I would like this... my husband bought it to “finish” a space in our attic to use as storage - well it’s amazing! Great quality and cleans up the space without spending a ton of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri P

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. I bought it to help protect our newly epoxied floors and now after months of use it's still holding up great. My one and only complaint is wood chips on the mat are almost impossible to vacuum off. If you do a lot of wood work in the garage then roll the mat up or don't purchase it because the two don't mix.
customer_reviews.author: J martin

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much i bought one at first but i decide to get two im so please with my purchase good material easy to clean easy in everything.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape
customer_reviews.text: The shape/cut of this mat is not for a car. Maybe a moped, motorcycle or golf cart but not a car. The only thing worse than this product is the stupid people who wrote reviews on it! Essentially it is useless to me but I am debating on ordering another one to get enough coverage on the floor for my vehicle or just sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine C.

customer_reviews.title: Working Well for Us
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one we purchased for our garage. we live in an area that gets a lot of snow. prior to having this we were putting down cardboard on the husband's side (mini van) of the garage and was winging it on my side. I decided to be the first to try this, and was absolutely surprised at 1) how great it looked and 2) how well it was containing the sloppy mess from the elements. We got a 2nd one for the mini van, and its doing the job
customer_reviews.author: kksingg

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles DO NOT fall out!
customer_reviews.text: This mat in theory is exactly what I needed. But despite the instructions that say, “don’t worry, all the wrinkles from convenient packaging will fall out”, they do not. I’ve left this mat laying open on my garage floor (while parking in the driveway) for ten days now and it doesn’t look any better than it did when I unfolded it initially. If anyone has an idea on how to get this thing to straighten out and lose the wrinkles, that would be awesome!
customer_reviews.author: unwhineawhile

customer_reviews.title: good mat for under golf cart
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit that I purchased. I have 2 golf carts, and the mats protect my garage floor from any spills or drips from the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: artie

customer_reviews.title: Nice garage carpet
customer_reviews.text: Definitely like the carpet for noise reduction and softer floor. Seems pretty durable and relatively easy to clean with a vacuum. Carpet arrives folded with numerous creases and wrinkles that don't come out easily at all. Would be much better to have carpet delivered on a roll.
customer_reviews.author: willpwr

customer_reviews.title: Armor All Garage Mat
customer_reviews.text: Overall the quality is good. However, it just feels like felt with a rubber backing. With charcoal being the color, shows every little speck of dirt. It's also boxed up like a tarp. It takes forever to get the kinks out of it to lay flat. I tried to vacuum and since it's not completely to the garage floor, sucks up into the vacuum cleaner. If I wouldn't had cut it to fit my garage, I would have returned it..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... our garage floor epoxied and wanted to keep it nice. You do not need to tape it down ...
customer_reviews.text: It was everything we thought it would be We had our garage floor epoxied and wanted to keep it nice. You do not need to tape it down at all. It stays in place really nicely We bought three for our three car garage All three of our cars (even our F150) fit really good on them It looks like we carpeted our garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: karen Furness

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR CAR
customer_reviews.text: THIS MAT IS CHEAP AND NOT FOR PARKING ON - BETTER FOR WALKING IN WORK AREA
customer_reviews.author: LaurenH

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs Water
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for purchase was to soak up snow melt in the winter and it works great sometimes it is too much but i just squeegee the water out of the garage. i think they look great in the garage and would buy them again, i have had them for 3 years with no rips or issues at all. i make sure not to turn my wheels on them as i think that would ruin them Negative - dirt, leaves and sawdust stick to it like glue, its very hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Ryan LaBrecque

customer_reviews.title: One charcoal/one gray when both charcoal were ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed as I ordered two of the charcoal mats and received a charcoal and a gray mat. It's not a huge problem as this is a temporary cover for the upcoming New England winter. I plan on ordering 3 more to cover the entire garage floor but would certainly appreciate getting them all the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: light wt  easy to handle for a 77 y/o woman with back problems
customer_reviews.text: Recently put it down will not know much.... until spring when I pick it up there is no sewer drain in my garage so i have to contain winter mess for a while I like that the material is light wt and easily maneuverable... so far so good seems good except for the pine needles collecting and getting stuck in the upper surface hope they will shake out or vacuum out later
customer_reviews.author: geri

customer_reviews.title: Great garage mat
customer_reviews.text: We have an older Honda with a slight oil leak. I purchased this mat to keep the garage floor clean. It does a perfect job and it is the perfect size. I would highly recommend this product. It's light and easy to move. It absorbs extremely well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MHalf22

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: The mat is just okay. It's over priced. It's doing the job, but it's just a cheap felt with a rubber backing. It doesn't come rolled, so it has creases that never seem to come out. The mats, I bought two, weren't cut evenly. I had to cut it myself to make them look the same.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Floor mat
customer_reviews.text: It is thin as stated in other reviews. It lays flat and I do not use the supplied double-sided tape because it does not move around when I park my truck on it. I use it to keep my newly epoxied floor clean and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Honestly
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to rate this product yet. Just finished repainting the walls and ceiling and painted the floor with epoxy paint. Checked with the paint manufacturer and hand to wait 7 days before putting on the floor. I did think for the cost of this product it was a little thin! But, I purchased 2 of them and I will evaluate it and rerate this product after 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for wet Car
customer_reviews.text: With our newly painted garage floor I didn't want the car dripping on it as it is quite rainy here. This matt is perfect. Didn't have to tape it down as it laid out perfectly in a couple of days and doesn't slip.
customer_reviews.author: TuTu

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay on
customer_reviews.text: It’s impossible to wash a vehicle while parked on top of the mat. It gets wet and slippery and all crumbled up. Accumulates a lot or water underneath it and difficult to stay in place. The double sided tape does not work
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Castro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for garage
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice thin mat for my garage gym. Seems durable for its thickness. The underside thin rubbery backing holds to the garage floor good enough. Vacuum works on it without catching or rolling. Easy to cut. Great value for the price. Creases smooth out very quickly after unfolding and laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat
customer_reviews.text: This Matt is really big LOL you can put a full-size SUV on there and have enough room to walk around it nicely. I have it in my shop and we absolutely love it. The traps the water nicely and dries out fairly quickly. I’m glad I bought this. I did buy the tape but I have not used it. We have not needed it it lays out really nicely the corners do not come up at all
customer_reviews.author: elijah pedone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a One Car Garage
customer_reviews.text: My garage floor was cleaned while I was waiting for the floor mat to arrive. It came early, I rolled it out and it fit my one car unit perfectly. It is very lite and easy to handle. It had a few creases from being folded in the box but they flattened out quickly. I did not use any tape to secure. I drove my car in and it held in place. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I did like the floor covering very much. But I ordered the x-large size. The one that I got was of the right length. Or at least it fit my garage in length. But it was not as wide as what I ordered. I was very disappointed in it for that. So now I have a floor covering with not full coverage. I would not mind so much but I paid for the extra large and got less. Hey just be carful and don't be like me. If you don't get what you order send it back. But it was a nice piece if it was the right size.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Too thin for garage use
customer_reviews.text: As in the description, it is literally a garage floor mat. It is too thin and blows with the wind so you need to use floor tape to keep it secured. I have a sealed and painted garage floor and even then, it doesn't hold still with any tire movement once a car is in the garage. Perhaps it would work fine as a garage carpet but it doesn't work for me when I put cars on it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great topper for rubber gym flooring.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I'm using it in conjunction with 1/4 rubber gym flooring. The rubber flooring gives some cushion and the garage mat protects the gym floor. The rubbery side of the garage mat clings well to the rubber flooring. We intend to use half the garage as a workout space, but we may purchase another one of these so that we at least have the option to park another car inside. It sure beats spending $2000+ on a proper epoxy application or polished cement to make my old garage floor presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Javier

customer_reviews.title: For me...The kitchen ... not the garage
customer_reviews.text: I do a fair amount of cooking that involves searing at high heat which splashes grease and oil everywhere. The idea of stepping on grease and oil and tracking it around the house gives me anxiety. This has helped tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: GearMo

customer_reviews.title: Protects Our Epoxy Garage Floor
customer_reviews.text: Great covering for our new epoxy garage floor. I did not want hot FL tires damaging our floor so gave this a try. So far it vacuums very easy and I did not need the included double sided tape to keep it down. The rubber backing holds it in place nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It's good, different, not exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a big roll out tarp so to speak. Better quality and I expect it to last a good long while, but it is meant to be season temporary. I do think it will protect my garage floor well from rain and snow run off from my car. I do prefer something that looks permanent like rubber mats because this tarp type doesn't lay down like it is meant to stay.
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Listening

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lawn Mower floor protection...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a lawn tractor to sit on after cutting grass and rinsing off with water. We didn't want spots on the new concrete floor. It is well made and the mower fits on it perfectly. It is doing the job we purchased it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Servant48

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This mat is only okay. Since I was able to get it at a discount price as “used”, it’s fine. But no way would I pay full price. The mat is paper thin. The only benefit for me is that it does protect the garage floor paint from tires tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the midwest winters
customer_reviews.text: Thought this might be good for our garage , now have rubber ones and it can get very sloppy with all the snow and ice. Ordered this , but once it came , realized what a soggy mess it would be in our climate, would look great in my brother's garage in FL, very thin etc. Sorry we had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: It is a cloth type material
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product I was under the impression that it would be a rubber type material, but it is a cloth type material and I think it would not do for heavy traffic in and out of the garage. I should have done more research before ordering it, I did not take it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to clean off with blower.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the mat. It stays put and is easy to blow off. It has been in place for about a month in our carport under my wife’s car. We have had no rain since it has been installed so I cannot comment on how it works under wet conditions. So far I like it and it makes the carport look better.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this several months and it is like new! I’ve swept off leaves and easily vacuumed pine needles that come off tires. No tears and doesn’t move or roll when driven on. Water dries overnight and protective barrier keeps my painted garage floor like new! Price was ok, but will be worth it if this stands the test of time
customer_reviews.author: Angela D. White

customer_reviews.title: Its easy to take out and shake off
customer_reviews.text: This is being used as a floor covering for our new van. Just to protect the original flooring. Its easy to take out and shake off, and the foam like underside resists wet spills.. It's inexpensive enough that I can toss the old one If I ever need to, and put in a new one. It's been in use for about a year and does just what I need it to do. I did not trim it to fit, just folded over the excess, but trimming would be very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Looks' great - comes Rolled just 1fold - that straightens right out ,,, inexpensive way to make that unfinished garage floor look rich and finished ,, Installation instructions : unroll use...
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lies flat
customer_reviews.text: I let it lie flat a few days in a spare room before putting in on my garage floor. It has not shifted or lifted around the edges even though I did nothing to fasten it down. It handled a snowy Ohio winter with no problems. The salty slush was always causing the garage floor paint to flake off before I had this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Scientist

customer_reviews.title: This mat really keeps the melting snow off my garage floor
customer_reviews.text: The instructions said to use double stick tape to stick the mat to the garage floor. I didn't need to do that, it lays flat and stays put. Really absorbs the melting snow. Keeps the water contained so it can evaporate. A floor squeegee would be good if you really had a lot of water to absorb.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.  Can’t sweep or blow clean, needs to be vacuumed occasionally.
customer_reviews.text: Because it comes in a big roll the edges like to curl up when it’s laid flat. We put down a roll of painters tape around the edges. Thought it’s not beautiful it prevents sliding around and it prevents my child from pulling up the edges (for now). I only bought one so I’m not sure how clean a seam would look.
customer_reviews.author: businessguy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Did not buy tape to keep it in place... Some slippage when pulling car in, & not very thick so it twists (at times) depending on how car hits matt when pulling in...not terrible but in my garage the side of tire that buckles happens to be where we walk, so have caught my shoe on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase will leak
customer_reviews.text: Purchase 2 in Nov 19, w/ all the snow & now the rain started to leak around the wheel wells & under body of the cars. Like - look & easy 2 clean - Dislike - will not hold up with lots of snow or rain
customer_reviews.author: OD

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I built a bathroom with a washer/driver setup in my garage that was about 15' x 7' on top of the concrete floor. The Armor floor mat worked great. It was easy to cut to fit. The mat is a good barrier atop the cold concrete floor in the winter. It looks great also. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: overtsr

customer_reviews.title: Memory folds would not relaxe
customer_reviews.text: This product comes fouled in box and creases would not come out. Left rolled out on driveway for a day at 84 degree day and the memory creases would not come out. Returned two for nether one would remove the memory fold.
customer_reviews.author: Don Vance

customer_reviews.title: Ramp and floor cover for toyhauler
customer_reviews.text: Use this to cover the ramp and floor of my toyhauler camper in order to prevent tire marks and dirt when loading motorcycles and UTV. The rubberized underside grips well, remains flat and doesn't move when loading. I broom or vacuum dirt when done travelling and it looks as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I give 4 stars on installation. It's easier to install with an extra person or two! Use carpet tape (double sided) as shown in the instructions. I don't have an opinion on "Easy to clean" yet because I haven't needed to do so. With proper application of the right floor tape, the floor mat does not pull up during slight turning of the front wheels while in slow motion. Obviously, fast and sudden movements will pull the floor mat. This is a great product if you rent a place with a private garage and you vehicle leaks a little oil etc.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Color Match Failure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these. 1) 22x8+ 1) 17x7+ 2) 20 x7+. Yep need all of them. 3 are exactly charcoal gray. 1 of the 20x 7+ Is very different in color like a lighter blue gray. Being that they all go in the exact same building...I’m not happy! The 17x7+ also ripped the vital/rubberized type coating on the back, just by simply turning the wheel of my lawn tractor to adjust its position. Thing to remember...straight in...straight.
customer_reviews.author: David Hicks

customer_reviews.title: absorbent garage mat/rug
customer_reviews.text: Doing the job so far in these brutal Buffalo winters. Dries quickly and is still sticking to the floor quite well even though it is soaked daily by melting snow and salt. Try not to turn the car's wheels while on it or it can/will bunch up a little bit. Certainly not disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase It was easy to install in my garage and this mat helped to enhance the look of the garage. This mat has worked great for protecting and preventing any oil leakage from ruining my garage floor. The huge benefit to this product is that it makes my garage look great, it actually helps to protect my garage floor and it is easy to clean. Overall this is a great product and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Allanson

customer_reviews.title: This is the widest mat I could find
customer_reviews.text: This was for one of my elderly neighbors who wanted her recently exposed garage floor protected from tire Marks and this was the largest mat I could find cut the extra 4 feet and added it on her driver side for her to walk on from her car to the door Worked out perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For Me
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my garage floor (epoxy), can be slippery. The absorbency is great for the thickness. The mat is very lite and movable for cleaning and drying.....this is important for a garage in my opinion especially in the northeast during winter. I have used the other type of mats available, thick plastic with the locking plastic edging (effectively a car sized plastic tray). These also work well but the downside is that they hold the water in the plastic tray and are hard to move and or empty in the winter because they are not very flexible. I would recommend the Armor All product based on its flexibility and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work Smarter not Harder
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Does a great job of protecting my garage floor from dirt and oil. When it gets too dirty, I just pull it out onto the driveway, spray it off, and it's good as new! WAY easier than removing everything from my garage to power wash the floor. I wish I had purchased one a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Installed this item a couple of weeks ago. I like it, easy to install (I did not have to trim it). My car said thanks for the carpet, so everyone is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TR Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Classy Garage
customer_reviews.text: Really do enjoy how this makes the garage look. The only thing I would say I have an issue with is how it dispearses water across the entire surface area. Don't leave boxes on this when you drive into the garage or they will certainly get wet, even up to 4 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the answer to the garage floor. We got two rather than paint the garage. We also got the recommended double sided tape but have not needed it. The mats stay put when the car is driven on. Have not had them for a winter although we don't have issues with big snow. Very pleased with the mats. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jbnimble

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The mat was folded and could see the fold lines. It took some time to place it flat on the ground. While on the floor, I had to pull the corners away and use silicone to stick it to the ground. This avoided the fold issue. Otherwise, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super floor covering
customer_reviews.text: Although this is intended for the garage, I am using it in my art studio. Great floor cover for this. It will be easy to clean and quiet
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on car mat
customer_reviews.text: UPS finally picked up umbrella (that came in box instead of car mat). Awaiting car mat. Will update to better review upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: oracleofthejedi

customer_reviews.title: Can't cut them properly at the factory?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really run this through it's paces yet, but I got two of these and they were both cut crooked. Can't install them square with anything, and it doesn't look good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of two for my two car garage. They are so comfortable to walk on barefooted - that was not so with my painted concrete floors. I bought these to prevent the tires on my car from wearing off the paint on my concrete floors. They certainly do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Leahey

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the floor mat. I am satisfied with both mats. The only problem is that they do lose color after six months. Presently I have one mat that is dark charcoal and the other that is faded charcoal. I recommend that you buy all that you need at the same time so that everything fades at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for protecting your garage floor from any car leaks, dirt, residue from your tires or just keeping your garage floor clean. It lays flat and doesn't move when I'm entering or exiting the garage and it's easy to clean. It's worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good for painted garage floor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that my son will not play on the cold garage floor. He loves playing in garage. The floor was recently painted and is cold during winter. This has a good grip. And u can cut the material as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rajiv subramaniam

customer_reviews.title: Great for covering up garage floor
customer_reviews.text: Placed two of these on our Epoxy floor, and it works wonders. Absorbs all AC condensation and rain water drops. Does not move around when turning wheel on the mat within reason. Does not lift up at all. Did not even have to use the included double sided tape to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: A.zhe

customer_reviews.title: Take that winter!
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with Midwestern winters we were having lots of puddles in our garage from snow melt off the car. We were astonished at how much this helped. It was very easy to set in place and it has absolutely absorbed everything we've thrown at it. As simple a solution as this is I definitely would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C Roman

product_meta.title: Armor All AAGFMC17 Charcoal 17' x 7'4" Garage Floor Mat
product_meta.description: Size:17' x 7'4"Whether you want to give your garage a new look, expand your living space or showcase your ride, the Armor All Garage Floor Mats are an easy to install and affordable floor covering option. These mats work great in the garage but also can be used in a basement, exercise area, laundry room or greenhouse. The mat has a carpet-like look and feel, It is soft to walk on, it hides unsightly cracks and stains and installs in just minutes. Dirt, leaves, mud, excess water and other elements get trapped on the mat and help to reduce tracking into your home. The mats are lightweight and extremely durable. Patented Drymate material absorbs and contains liquids and wicks away moisture. The absorbent top layer of our mat is made from a non-woven polyester fabric that easily contains melting snow, water, and other fluids. The bottom layer of our mat features our liquid bonded waterproof backing made from polyolefin. Our waterproof backing stops liquids, motor oil, brake fluid, gasoline, and coolant and prevents these liquids from soaking through to damage or stain the surface below. The waterproof backing also works as a moisture barrier and will protect your vehicles, antique cars, motorcycles, and other equipment from rusting during storage. When installing the mat ensure the surface is clean, roll the mat out, place the mat fabric side up, pull the corners tight and affix Drymate Double Sided Tape to adhere the mat to your surface. The mat will have some wrinkles at first from being packaged but over time these will relax out. Please note that our material can be easily cut to fit with scissors and the edges will not fray or split. Combine multiple mats to cover your entire garage surface. Unlike heavy rubber or vinyl type mats, the Armor All Garage Floor Mat is easy to move and clean. Simply vacuum, hose off or power-wash with a mild detergent. Or just spot clean as needed. Do not bleach. If your mat becomes oversaturated by excess rain, water or melting snow, just squeegee off excess water or wet vac and it will air-dry faster. Armor All Garage Floor Mats are proudly Made in the USA, made from 80% recycled fibers and are Phthalate and BPA free. In the box, we include a 20FT x 1. 5-INCH roll of Drymate Double Sided Tape, Heavy Duty Adhesive. The benefit of our tape is that it allows you to secure the mat in place. WARNING FOR PAINTED OR SEALED FLOORS: Some types of epoxy, paint or sealers may react to waterproof backing causing the mat to stick to the floor or leave a residue. Refer to your epoxy, paint or sealers Manufacturer’s care instructions for precautions or interactions. Allow at least 72 hours after application before installing the mat. Check the flooring under the mat periodically to ensure that the sealed floor and mat are compatible.
feature_bullets: PROTECTS SURFACES, KEEPS FLOORS CLEAN (TRANSFORMS GARAGE): Our mat is designed to protect your garage floor surface, help keep it clean, hide unsightly cracks and stains and create additional living space. Carpet-like look and feel. Soft to walk on.

ABSORBENT FABRIC, WATERPROOF BACKING (SLIP RESISTANT): Patented Drymate material absorbs and contains liquids and wicks away moisture. Waterproof backing stops liquids from soaking through, prevents them from damaging or staining the surface below.

EASY TO INSTALL (INCLUDES DRYMATE DOUBLE SIDED TAPE): Clean your surface, roll the mat out, pull corners tight and affix Drymate double-sided tape to adhere the mat to your surface. The mat will have some wrinkles but over time these will relax out.

EASILY CUT TO FIT AND MATERIAL WON'T FRAY (COVER ENTIRE GARAGE SURFACE): Our material can be easily cut to fit with scissors and the edges will not fray or split. Combine multiple mats to cover your entire garage surface.
EASY TO CLEAN (VACUUM, POWERWASH OR HOSE OFF): To clean simply vacuum, hose off or power-wash with a mild detergent. Or just spot clean as needed. Do not bleach.

(MADE IN THE USA) LIGHTWEIGHT & DURABLE: The absorbent top layer of our mat is made from a non-woven polyester fabric and 80% recycled fibers. The bottom layer is our liquid bonded waterproof backing made from polyolefin. Phthalate & BPA free.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,110 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
